alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 3:53PM MST until January 14 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulation of 18 to 32 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with widespread winter driving conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
